note.p: Daughter of Joseph Turnbull, clerk in the General Post Office, London. Married George Cupples (1786–1850) in 1820; he was Free Church minister of Doune, Perthshire. Mother of George Cupples (1822–91).
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 August 2015)
London, England, marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 August 2015)
